document_data.mainbody:
lackbuckles Wines & Tonics was a shop in Myth Drannor that specialized in selling wine, fortified spirits, and herbs that could be used for healing and medicine. It was run by the well-known halfling businessman Tyullac Blackbuckle.
It was located the Old City of Myth Drannor.
The shop was built upon the ground floor of the city and extended two stories higher into the boughs of a tree.
Among the various beverages offered at Blackbuckles was a unique drink made by mixing elven elverquisst and stout. While some elves saw this drink as profane to their culture, it was quite popular among the citys ahkfaern.
